about_the_game:
Breaching Harkon is a top-down tactical roguelike shooter with smooth and crisp pixel art graphics. Engage in high-stakes missions where you'll plan your approach carefully, utilizing cover, strategic positioning, and a variety of weapons to outsmart and outgun your enemies. Navigate through dynamic, richly detailed environments that react to your actions and adapt to your strategies. Engage in a thrilling narrative that has you taking down a corrupt billionaire with a private army at his disposal.

Gameplay!

Battle through challenging, diverse level designs, eliminating enemies in your path. Unlock and collect over 30 unique weapons throughout your journey, each fully customizable to suit your playstyle. Enhance your character with powerful upgrades, from deploying drone turrets to gaining a second chance after death. In the final stage, secure your escape via helicopter and prepare to face your next mission.

Weapons and gear!

With over 30 unique and different weapons that range from shotguns to pistols to assault rifles, there is bound to be a weapon that fits to your unique play style. Upgrade your weapons with tons of upgrades that range from stocks to silencers!

Upgrades!

Purchase over 14 upgrades that enhance every aspect of your player and make you a force to be reckoned with.

Narrative!

In the remote frontier of Halcyon, ruthless billionaire Victor Harkon exploits the land and its people using his private army and advanced tech. You, a skilled operative in the underground resistance group Vanguard, you must navigate diverse landscapes to gather resources and allies to overthrow Harkon and liberate the region.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Dual Core 2 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 compatible with at least 500mb of memory
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 900 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9 compatible sound card or integrated sound chip

short_description: Become a skilled vigilante in Breaching Harkon. Hunt down the world's worst criminals with customizable weapons and tactical combat. Experience intense gunfights and a gripping narrative. Are you ready to breach?
